text:
Mmm~, the ocean.
Wanted to see it again~.

The vast expanse, stretching endlessly,
and sparkling so brightly...!
Sorta like a stage, ain't it?

But, I might not have time to
show you the ocean for a while, Kogane-san.

I-I know~!
Just thought I'd mention it~!

But, for the Kogane who's working hard
and busy right now,

Maybe the sparkling of something other
than the ocean is closer.

Producer! Since it might be a
while until you see the real ocean──

In exchange,
I want you to look at me closely!

An "idol" swimming
in a sea of light~!
